Summons #yBloons targeting r#EVERYONE or reduces r#EVERYONE's #yStrength for a turn. NL

turns:

and Reduce #rEVERYONE's #yStrength by

${ModID}:DruidDeck.NAME: Druidic Deck
${ModID}:DruidDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yFocus. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:BasicDeck.NAME: Blank Deck
${ModID}:BasicDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:MagicDeckOld.NAME: Magic Deck
${ModID}:MagicDeckOld.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #r-2 #yWizard #yStrength. Gain #yWizard #yStrength at the end of your turn. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:MagicDeck.NAME: Magick Deck
${ModID}:MagicDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose one of the Mox colors, gain that Mox. Playing Monkeys without spending Mox grants an additional card next turn. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:MoxDeck.NAME: Magick Deck
${ModID}:MoxDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 less card, and draw a Vessel card from this. Playing Monkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:StrikerDeck.NAME: Blank Deck
${ModID}:StrikerDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first #yBomb or #yMortar costs #b1 less each turn. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:CrowDeck.NAME: Cultist Deck
${ModID}:CrowDeck.FLAVOR: A deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing Monkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:RedDeck.NAME: Red Deck
${ModID}:RedDeck.FLAVOR: A red deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard the first #yUnplayable card drawn each turn, then draw #b1 additional card.

${ModID}:OrangeDeck.NAME: Orange Deck
${ModID}:OrangeDeck.FLAVOR: A orange deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Red Deck. NL Discard the first #b2 #yUnplayable cards drawn each turn. NL #gYou #gmust #gpossess #gthe #rRed #rDeck #gfor #gthis #gRelic #gto #gappear.

${ModID}:BlueDeck.NAME: Blue Deck
${ModID}:BlueDeck.FLAVOR: A blue deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b1 additional card.

${ModID}:CyanDeck.NAME: Cyan Deck
${ModID}:CyanDeck.FLAVOR: A cyan deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Blue Deck. NL At the start of your turn, draw #b2 additional cards. At the end of your turn, put a random card on top of your draw pile. You must possess the b#Blue b#Deck for this Deck to appear.

${ModID}:PurpleDeck.NAME: Purple Deck
${ModID}:PurpleDeck.FLAVOR: A purple deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw a random card from your #ydiscard pile. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:YellowDeck.NAME: Yellow Deck
${ModID}:YellowDeck.FLAVOR: A yellow deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces your #rrightmost #rDeck. NL Gain [E] on the first turn of each combat. Playing #yMonkeys grants an additional card next turn. You must possess a #yDeck for this Deck to appear.

${ModID}:GreenDeck.NAME: Green Deck
${ModID}:GreenDeck.FLAVOR: A green deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces your #rrightmost #rDeck. NL Gain [E] at the start of your next turn if you could play a 1+ cost card.

${ModID}:SilverDeck.NAME: Silver Deck

${ModID}:WhiteDeck.FLAVOR: A black deck of Monkeys, Bloons and Powers.

At the end of combat, heal
HP. Whenever you lose HP from a card, increase this healing by b#1.

${ModID}:DivineDeck.NAME: Divine Deck

${ModID}:DivineDeckold.NAME: Divine Deck

NL Playing #rMonkeys grants an additional card next turn.

${ModID}:Ukulele.NAME: Ukulele
